```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
# read in the data from /courses/EDS214/group_project/thebrenniacs/data

```

```{r}
watershed_areas <- bq1 %>% 
  bind_rows(bq2) %>% 
  bind_rows(bq3) %>% 
  bind_rows(prm)
```
